name: Science Alerte
description:
Science Alert is a game that asks players to make calls to their memory and reflection. It is a game where players will have to pass a course, while being subjected to a timer.
Following a failed experiment by a scientist in his laboratory, an immense creature was born. Being absolutely unable to control this crèature, the scientist is obliged to flee to the sight 
of the aggressive nature of the creature. 
Unfortunately, the experiment involved different species of insects. The creature has dispersed its poisonous venom into every room of the laboratory. The scientist will have to find the right way to access the exit, while avoiding the venom invisible to the human eye.
The exit is at the end of the third room of the laboratory. The more the scientist moves into his lab, the harder the path will be to find.
Science Alert is aimed at an audience of all ages.
It can be played for free on mobile, on computer or on the website Itch.io directly.
A Science Alert game lasts up to 12 minutes.
After these 12 minutes, if the player has not managed to leave the 3rd room, the game will be lost.Science Alert, although having a gameplay existing for a long time (maze/ course) is not inspired by games already existing.The universe being quite wide, it gave free rein to the imagination of the creators.
